mapper.select: select * from (select * from Files where FILETYPE = 'y') where save_file like #{date} || '%'

select * from (select * from files where save_fileno in(select save_fileno from (select to_number(SUBSTR(save_filename, 7, 8)) savedata,files.SAVE_FILENO save_fileno from files) where savedata between #{dateFrom} and #{dateTo})) where memberno = #{memberno} order by save_filename
select save_file from files where save_filename = #{del}
